title: TFR Ep. 614: Hustle, You Won't Be Alone, 5 Favorite Dramatic Turns By Comedians
description:
This week on The First Run, Chris and Matt lace up their Chuck Taylors and head down to the court to shoot some hoops as Adam Sandler returns in the Netflix original, ‘Hustle’. The sports movie is a tried and true genre, but is there enough there to make for compelling viewing? Or is it a clichéd exercise?  Then it’s on to the horror import, ‘You Won’t Be Alone’, that takes a more humanist turn with the witch ethos. But does it sacrifice the terror too?  There’s the shriek inducing rundown of the big releases on Physical Media, featuring the Streaming and Straight to DVD Picks of the Week.  Matt and Chris then wrap up the big show by sharing their 5 Favorite Dramatic Turns By Comedians.  Is this how Matt becomes Joker?  Listen on, if you dare!

00:00-09:30: Hustle

09:31-16:57: Physical Media Picks

16:58-26:58: You Won’t Be Alone

26:59-42:34: 5 Favorite Dramatic Turns By Comedians

42:35-43:47: Wrap Up

Theme music by Jamal Malachi Ford-Bey
